While I'm sightly mad about this, I'll try to keep my head cold and point out my opinion.
(word of advance, my main account is in LAS, I use this one to post here, is the same name if anyone can check my data)

1. First, you're only giving back BE for tier 3 runes, what about those old player who brought Tier 1 runes (that don't exist anymore) or tier 2 pre-1IP Price? They don't get anything back even when we spent a considerable ammount of IP as well?

2. I brought Rune pages once, a 2x1 deal I think, I can't remember if with IP or RP, however if I brought them with IP will I get he 1500BE twice? and if I brought them with RP will I not get anything aside from keeping them?

3. The tier 3 convertion is ridiculously low, maybe you can check a bit of adjustement depending on the original rune price.

4. Reading about this and about the level/chest thing I must say, you haven't tackled two of the problems I see with it.

4.1 The BE gain. Early levels chest are more prompt to give champion shard, I understand that, but what about older player that still don't have all champions? (League has a lot of champions), will their chances of getting BE be all about RNG? if so will be harder for them buy the new champions. I suggest if this haven't been tackled yet, that each chest gives a bit of BE guaranteed (not a lot, but guaranteed to people know how much they must level to get it surely (and if they are lucky will get shards to powder first))

4.2 IP Sink. One we get all champions (again) there is nothing to spend BE on (masteries don't count since some of us can't get an S to save our lives). I suggest a convertion system to burn BE, there is two things I can think of. 1 could be a convertion from BE to Orange Essence to a ratio of 1000BE for 1 OE (an example) This would reward those who stack a lot of BE (and would work like runes did, you can spend a lot of BE to activate a shard skin and don't have enough to buy the new champion, so RP). or 2, pay discount, You can pay 6300 BE to get a 20% discount In a skin RP price, (people already ask riot for those little RP amount, why don't let them get it by playing the game?)

Those are my opinions, at least the ones I get for only watching the video and reading the page. I hope one of you can read this and tell me if Riot has talked about these point in this.
Some people are never happy. But rune pages you bought with rp will get you free skins for champs you own. 1 1350rp skin per 4 pages

consider: if they wanted skins for rp, they would have bought them with rp.
1 1350 rp RANDOM skin per 4 pages with rp, not total.

so the agency garnered by monetization design that necessitates more pages, again by design, and sells them from the nikasaur dodge era on seven years through the shift in staff (hi lyte, bye lyte) and size and even attempts to retain selling them.

net result of leaving a problem design for seven years plus? enjoy your 1350 skin for some random champ you really don't touch you picked up for trading in pregame or when you started, and will never really see.

its not equivalent agency there at all.

additionally just looking at the gamer motivation types, sure it might make a collector happy who was seeking "have everything" anyway as that is their jive, but it does nothing for the i am better pvp type, the explorer type, or the team type.

so your response to them improving the game is "how dare you, refund me all my money" ? 

you got a lot of use out of the rune pages didn't you? they'll still be nice to have going forward too. I think youre just being a baby

given even they have said this is a big risk in a few different areas, improving is quite the hopeful thought.

cart before horse, counted birds in bushes. "remains to be seen".

it should not surprise you that there have been both requests AND petitions for the revival or resurrection of PAST game states and/or seasons in some form.

you have not addressed the player motivation aspect of the proposed design presented as lacking.
the further shift towards gambling addiction design elements(literally from certain textbooks i could get you citations for) and have resorted to fiat namecalling.

this lends me to the perspective that you are aware your argument or the experience and background on which the perspective lacking grounded argument is based, happens to be weak or lacking.

riddle me this oh caller of names. in respect to the ability to buy outright a desired skin, why instead do we find we must pray to rngesus through loot crates instead? why is that considered acceptable? begin there with your merry churn through some of the scummery that begins with the origins of the slot machine and has conceptual logic persisting and pervading to today.

there is this grand old turn of axiom about those who do not know their history, but that is misleading, because knowing it merely allows one to see the exact same thing happening again the same way coming, not know its hows and why to see it in different shapes coming back.

last thoughts.

you are all losing your 20 mastery pages in the rollup too. once upon a time there wasn't a limit on them, but they were client sided, so if you went to another computer you had to remake them all. that lead to a bug that some exploited to have invalid ranks in some masteries, which led to a no cooldown summoner spell exploit. that lead to fixing it moving them server side and setting a limit on their number to save server space and costs.

still the 20 pages were totally free and given to all instantly for use.

have you seen a soul complaining for compensation on them? no?

when you choose to invest in a thing you made a choice to invest in a thing. if league was shut down tomorrow i dare say most of us wouldn't consider dropping 100$ today worthwhile. we argue amortized value, to a system they made clear they had no real intent or interest in changing. we had rune price reductions, but not retroactive outside a small window. we had rune stat changes globally with no giveback. the very design as noted mandates a pressure and need for them. 

finally they opt not to drop rune prices as they now have, not to make the current page system editable as per masteries, but to throw the baby out with the bathwater and chunk in something new.

except its not something new. it is blisteringly in your face obvious that runes are just gone. what we in fact have is masteries 2.0 to rule them all. but we are retaining the rune name and pages for business reasons(name/theme/branding and monetization). those long long requested functions to be applied to the old system like editable runepages in pregame? finally coming but without the actual runes.

we tend to call this bait and switch under most circumstances, and we are not receiving goods in kind. we are having our apples taken and being given potatoes or bananas at random.

so feel free to continue to call me a baby for asking you to consider another viewpoint, without having claimed it was mine(a fine distinction in your vigourous hate you managed to miss) but i think your ARGUMENT needs to grow up.

good day fine sir or madam.
Man, the conversion on the quints is brutal.

>Players will receive an Epic Mystery Skin on a champion they own for every 4 rune pages spent with RP, rounded up.

Does that mean that those who bought 2 or less rune pages with RP get nothing?

No!  Here are some examples:

You bought 2 rune pages with RP ---> You get 1 epic skin 
You bought 4 rune pages with RP ---> You get 1 epic skin 
You bought 5 rune pages with RP ---> You get 2 epic skins

etc.

Does that make more sense? It's rounded up to every 4 pages.

If you're really curious you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask!

What will these people receive as they already own all the epic(and every other tier) skin.
You'll still get an epic perm skin in loot that you can disenchant for orange essence to use on upgrading something else.

Is this a joke? Excuse me but how exactly is Riot justifying "For every 3900 RP you spent on rune pages, you get a random 1350 RP skin that you arent even guaranteed to actually want"

???????????????????

Most people bought them in a bundle so it's significantly better than that.

And considering you got good use out of those pages and are now getting free stuff you didn't expect to get I think it's pretty good.
Additionally, Rune Pages will carry over into the new system and aren't free to use, so you'll still have some value and potential use associated with them.
Oh ok. I thought it was rounded up by number instead of reward tier. Thx
Will rp become orange essence in the future?
What will happen for those who bought Rune Pages during the 2 for 1 sales?
Will we get 1500 ip per rune page even if we bought them in 2x1 purchases?
Will rune pages get a discount as well?
I haven't heard anything on this.  Rune Pages will continue to be used after runes have reforged, though!

Will they be free? Personally, I've always prioritized buying champions over rune pages because champions provide more fun at the same cost; no longer being restricted by that cost through either a future price reduction or just being free will be a huge incentive to use more pages.

Rune pages will not be free or discounted as they are still an optional item for you to use. All current pages you own will transfer with you into the new system though, as well as the compensation we're giving for the pages you've already purchased.

There is a discount right now for instance if I bought a page now for 6300 I would get 1500 back making the price 4800 which means anyone who buys rune pages now IS getting a discount Unless I missed something.

I have voiced this opinion elsewhere but under the current system masteries add abilities and can impact or augment playstyles while runes add only raw numbers and have impact on in game strength but not usually impact on play style (excepting perhaps CDR runes). For this reason I (and I imagine others) have a number of specialized mastery pages many of which are tailored to as few as one champion and mostly general rune pages intended to cover a wide range of champions, there are of course exceptions like ryze, thresh, and vladimir who often have dedicated rune pages, but in general I feel that this statement is not inaccurate.
Creating a new system which adds abilities and impacts playstyles, regardless of whether you call it runes or masteries, will replace masteries more directly than runes (a theory that is supported by riot's comments that base stats will be added to champions to cover up for the lost raw stats from runes). With that in mind, saying that players get to "keep our rune pages" rings false to me because we are losing 20 mastery pages in the transition and those mastery pages are what are being most directly replaced by the new rune system.

I don't mind changing currencies, I don't mind the new level mechanic, I don't mind the way rune and mastery pages are being combined, but I already don't have as many mastery pages as I would like and telling me to buy "rune pages" to replace the ones I do have bothers me to no end.

Does that mean, that next IP chroma sale is replaced with this blue essence shop?

Would be nice to get official announce, I know, I'm not the only one worrying about
Is our current amount of IP going to be converted with 6,5 ratio as well or should I buy tons of mastery tokens and disenchant them for blue essence?

One question, are the Runes Reforged changes hitting PBE (And I assume they'll stay on the PBE for quite a while) before the other preseason changes, according to what Joe (new001) mentioned?

These numbers are honestly stupid, 1500 on 6300 rune pages, sure we get to keep them but who needs 9 rune pages when you can change them pregame. These return values are kinda bull. And this whole lesser value for older runes thing, come on Riot. Let's also not forget that in the past there were no champ shard or loot chests, so your only way to get new champs was ip, and buying a full rune page cost as much as 3-4 champs. Nowadays people can get a champ just through crafting not to mention having a larger free rotation and more of the champs being reduced in price having been out so long. This is not fair to those of us like me who have been here since Season 2.
Will the BE costs for combining mastery tokens to unlock level 6/7 be scaled up as well, or will they still be 500/600?
